<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 152 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

A _helm of underwater action_ is a streamlined sallet with a visor and a flanged rear. While wearing the helmet with the visor down, you can see, hear, and speak clearly underwater. You also have a +1 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39).
